title: HELP! Game Locked at 60 Fps - Without Vsync and Uncapped
body:
I honestly don't know what else to do at this point. I updated drivers, disabled Vsync in the Nvidia Control Panel (as shown in image) and I have disabled Vsync in the game. Hopefully some pc guru can help me - or any input from anyone really! 

Thanks, 

Pics:

http://imgur.com/tauaElJ
http://imgur.com/tskKJ9h
http://imgur.com/ljBUZMZ
http://imgur.com/Qxs3zCM

replies.body: A recent windows update auto enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing some issues for a few players, including some FPS problems.  I recommend disabling that as your first step.  If you continue to experience any issues, I recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide which will help you tune up your PC.  Hopefully, this does the trick!
